channel.title: node_modules on Chaitanya's blog
channel.description: Recent content in node_modules on Chaitanya's blog

item.title: Delete All Node Modules on Your System
item.description: Use the following command to get the list of all node_modules folders on your system. $ npx npkill You can also use the following command to delete all node_modules folders on your system. $ npx npkill -D
